website_summaries.verdict: While a little bulky, this lightweight costume is a good fit for small to medium dogs.
pros: Weiner dog" costume is lightweight and very plush
High-quality material that does not restrict the dog's movements
cons: The costume itself is a little on the bulky side

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work Out As Planned 🤣
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Hot Dog costume for our daughter's dog because she kept escaping thru the fence into the neighbors yard. We thought the costume was fluffy enough that she wouldn't be able to squeeze thru.... we were wrong 🤣. My daughter had to call her neighbor and ask him to go in his backyard and catch her Hot Dog and bring it back to her house. The costume was well worth the money for all the hilarity. Also Lady Bird LOVES wearing her Hot Dog!
customer_reviews.author: James Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Required mods, but....
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price. We had to add to the Velcro closures as the medium size didn't fit my medium dog. BUT, my dog is a weiner/pit bull mix with a giant chest for a small dog. Nothing fits him right! Especially if it is only to be worn for a couple times a year, it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wizbang72

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, the cutest costume ever! I have an ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, the cutest costume ever! I have an 18 pound Maltese mix and he's a little top heavy but this costume adjusts well so it fits perfectly and doesn't seem to constrain his movement!
customer_reviews.author: Fifteenblades

customer_reviews.title: My boy won the Mutt Strut in this darling outfit.
customer_reviews.text: This item came so quickly. I needed it for a local charity Mutt Strut in our area. I have a mini Dachshund and he looked just adorable in it. In fact, he won first place. The item is bulky, but light weight. I live in the deep South so I only kept my pooch in it for the 30 minute event. It would be perfect for Halloween night where it gets a bit chilly. Great fit. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: My Daschund looked amazing for Halloween. It was easy to put on, plus my dog was able to both go potty and poop without any problems while wearing it. I think it will be a costume my dog will be wearing more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big. I had to sew the Velcro smaller. Other than that. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Adams

customer_reviews.title: Funny!
customer_reviews.text: Best costume ever haha. Good for laughs and worked for my dog who is long but not a daushund :)
customer_reviews.author: Susie Cho

customer_reviews.title: Sizes small
customer_reviews.text: A little small for a medium but super cute and comfortable for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Claire Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop laughing
customer_reviews.text: Any time I put this on my standard sized 20 pound dachshund, I immediately start laughing. It's way too funny and makes anyone smile who sees him. I got him a medium and it fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Lizana

customer_reviews.title: Don’t keep it on the dog for too long.
customer_reviews.text: My fog looks adorable in this costume, I don’t think he liked wearing it. He hot lots of complements on it. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: hannan mansur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wiener dog looks adorable in this. And is is very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Hot diggity dog
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality for the price. Easy to put on and super cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits but Corndog is not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 12 lb dachshund perfectly! He does NOT like it though and we usually don't have issues with sweaters/clothes on him.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Hates This
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture and fits my dog well - she hates it so much. I think she looks adorable so it's still a 5-star product in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Shawndra McCoy

customer_reviews.title: cute as a button
customer_reviews.text: ran true to size, could use to belly straps for more stability, would order from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Palmer  mommacjp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quailty. It fit my ween dog in the length but was much to big in the width.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cutest costume. Fits my dachshund / beagle mix perfectly in size Med.
customer_reviews.author: Galina Dementev

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my "weiner" (hot dog) for Halloween. Hasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my "weiner" (hot dog) for Halloween. Hasn't actually worn yet. I'm sure she will be cute in it.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Tschetter

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Was cute and looked like hotdog and bun with additions. The additions made it better. Fit fog perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: carla galeoto

product_meta.title: Forum Novelties - Pet Costume-Hot Dog Costume
